channel.title: Old weapon models?
channel.description:
I found these weapons on the garrysmod.org site when searching "Black Mesa" I saw the models on the wiki but no where else until now.
[img='https://s3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/garrysmod-org/1327/3/1024x768.jpg',left,474][/img]
[img='https://s3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/garrysmod-org/2437/2/1024x768.jpg',left,476][/img]
[img='https://s3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/garrysmod-org/2437/3/1024x768.jpg',none,475][/img]
Would someone be able to port these to the current version of Black Mesa/Garry's Mod?
I found them in the links here. [url]https://garrysmods.org/download/2437/black-mesa-source-all-weapons[/url] (All early weapons including the old MP5 and Shotgun.) [url]https://garrysmods.org/download/1327/black-mesa-source-npcs-pack[/url] (Old NPCs and M16.)

item.title: Old weapon models?
item.dc:creator: Mr_Walrusman
item.description:
I found these weapons on the garrysmod.org site when searching “Black Mesa” I saw the models on the wiki but no where else until now.

Would someone be able to port these to the current version of Black Mesa/Garry’s Mod?

I found them in the links here.
https://garrysmods.org/download/2437/black-mesa-source-all-weapons (All early weapons including the old MP5 and Shotgun.)
https://garrysmods.org/download/1327/black-mesa-source-npcs-pack (Old NPCs and M16.)

Read full topic
